img_above_text:
The cell beyond will require you to have beaten Captain Lotus-Vision to unlock, and holds a **Treasure Chest** with materials in addition to the Wisp on the ledge, guarded by another Red-Haired Yaksha.
## Upper Pagoda (Level 4)
img_below_text:
Once you reach the fourth level, the escape from this hell is closer than ever, but there's still one last stretch to cover.
![Wukong Pagoda 65.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e5/Wukong_Pagoda_65.jpg)

img_summary: The image depicts a dark, rocky environment within the Upper Pagoda (Level 4) of the game *Black Myth: Wukong*. The player character, armed with a staff, is seen approaching a dimly lit area with torches and a gated structure in the distance. This setting aligns with the walkthrough's description of progressing toward a cell containing a treasure chest and a Wisp, guarded by a Red-Haired Yaksha. The scene emphasizes the atmospheric tension and the player's journey deeper into the level.
